title: The all-devouring Wolves
author: VD
content_html: I’m not a big NBA fan, but I’m pleased to see the Wolves do so well. Back when all the talk of the next Michael Jordan was revolving around Vince, Kobe and AI, I always felt that KG was the only possible heir to the throne. If he can lead the Wolves to a championship, this will become obvious to everyone. He’s that rarity of rarities, a true superstar of genuine humility and civility. Best of luck to you and the pack, KG.
